data.title: New England Patriots links 7/12/24 - Henry, Hooper lead tight end roster reset
data.meta_description: Daily news and links for Friday
data.text:
Filed under:

New England Patriots News

New England Patriots Links

New England Patriots links 7/12/24 - Henry, Hooper lead tight end roster reset

Daily news and links for Friday

If you buy something from an SB Nation link, Vox Media may earn a commission. See our ethics statement.

Share this story

Share this on Reddit

Share All sharing options

Share All sharing options for: New England Patriots links 7/12/24 - Henry, Hooper lead tight end roster reset

TEAM TALK

Patriots Unfiltered: Judon contract negotiations, Hard Knocks and offseason hot topics. (2 hours)

LOCAL LINKS

Mike Kadlick’s 2024 Patriots Depth Projection series: Tight ends - Linebackers - Specialists - Running backs - Safeties - Offensive Line - Defensive Line.

Andy Hart digs deep to find 5 reasons the 2024 Patriots could be better than expected. 1. Change is good.

Ian Logue’s Patriots News: Patriots face a bulked up Joe Burrow heading into Week 1; More.

Jordy McElroy posts a clip of CB Christian Gonzalez’s viral workout video.

Scott Zolak cites the viral clip from ‘Hard Knocks’ that shows Drake Maye reciting play calls as a one reason to be excited about him being on the Pats.

Jerry Thornton says seeing just how thirsty the Giants were for Drake Maye is bourbon for any Patriots fan’s soul.

Zolak & Bertrand try to figure out why Bailey Zappe is still a member of the New England Patriots.

Michael Brauner notes CBS names just one Patriots player in its Top 100 list. Christian Barmore was ranked at No. 70 after not making the list last season. Meanwhile, Pats’ division rivals have numerous players on the Top 100 list.

Nick Goss tells us ESPN ranked the NFL’s top 10 safeties, and notes Kyle Dugger made the list at No. 8.

Jordy McElroy explains how the Patriots could use a Bill Belichick approach with Matthew Judon’s contract.

Mike D’Abate discusses that Bill Belichick has joined ‘Inside the NFL’, alongside former players Ryan Clark, Chad Johnson and Chris Long.

Jerry Thornton says the Summer of Belichick is in full swing with trips to Amsterdam, Taylor Swift, and his girlfriend showing him ‘There’s more to life than football’.

Max Sullivan reports Ex-New England Patriot Tully Banta-Cain brings Beach Football League to Hampton Beach.

NATIONAL NEWS

Cody Benjamin (CBS Sports) 2024 NFL head coach rankings. Jerod Mayo 31st. “At 38, Mayo at least projects a more transparent and inviting personality than longtime predecessor Bill Belichick. He also had a direct hand in New England’s feisty defenses of recent years. Still, it’s hard to know if he’ll be enough of a needed pivot from the previous regime’s old-school philosophies when, in many ways, he’s simply an extension of that regime.”

Cody Benjamin (CBS Sports) Ranking all 32 NFL head coaches by big-game résumé. Jerod Mayo excluded.

Josh Edwards (CBS Sports) Ranking Caleb Williams, Jayden Daniels and other NFL rookies most important to their team’s success. No Pats.

Bryan DeArdo (CBS Sports) Bill Belichick lands his latest media gig, serving as an NFL analyst for this TV show for the 2024 season.

Joe Lucia (Awful Announcing) NFL on Fox reportedly decides on 2024 broadcast teams; Fox’s NFL lineup lineup features a lot of the same names working with new partners.

Brendon Kleen (Awful Announcing) ‘Inside the NFL’ will be different in a lot of ways with its move to Fridays.

More From Pats Pulpit
